Lifelink
Break [i](When this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature.)[/i]
When this creature enters, exile target player’s graveyard.
notes: 2.2.0: Changed since we were getting rid of off-seer counters. Now just is a solid creature graveyard hate to make up for noah not hating graveyards now. Should help orzhov control more.
